instructions: From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Email . Tap the compose email icon. At the To field, enter the recipient's email address. To select a saved contact, tap the Contacts icon. Tap Subject and enter the subject. Tap the paperclip . Select the file type. Select or create the file. Tap OK . Enter message body text and then tap Send .
From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Email . Touch and hold the email you want to delete. Tap Delete .
